text: Tyler Henry helps a late family member of Tyler Oakley's say what he couldn't before he passed in Wednesday's episode of ` ` Hollywood Medium.'' ` ` It's a situation where basically a father figure wasn't able to be fully present, fully emotionally like...'I passed away and I don't feel like I've gotten to say everything that I needed to say,'''Henry says TooFab's exclusive sneak peek. ` ` But to mom, very specifically, and it's like almost - - I don't want to say a shame around this, but it was a feeling of like'Oh my God. I didn't get this chance.'''In another room, Oakley's mom confirms that
